episodes.title: Episode 2: Leaving the Cult
episodes.description:
In this powerful second episode, we explore the deeply personal experiences of those who have left the Jehovah’s Witnesses. Join Kyle, Shelley, and guests as they discuss:

The emotional and psychological toll of leaving a high-control group.
Strategies for exiting, including navigating family relationships and community loss.
Heartfelt stories of resilience, healing, and rebuilding a life outside the organization.
Trigger Warning: This episode includes discussions of trauma, suicidal thoughts, sexual assault, family estrangement, and mental health struggles. Viewer discretion is strongly advised.

If you or someone you know is considering leaving a high-control group, or if you are dealing with the aftermath of such an experience, please reach out for support. Resources and support networks are linked below to help you on your journey.

Resources for those escaping:
r/exjw: A reddit supportive community for former Jehovah’s Witnesses.
Learn more: https://www.jwfacts.com
Faith to Faithless: https://www.faithtofaithless.com/

episodes.title: Episode 1: Understanding the Jehovah's Witnesses Cult
episodes.description:
In this debut episode, we dive deep into the origins of the Jehovah’s Witnesses, uncovering the historical roots of this high-control group and exploring its evolution into the organization it is today. Join Kyle and guest Ray as they discuss:

The founding of the Jehovah's Witnesses by Charles Taze Russell and its early influences.
Significant transformations under leaders like Joseph Rutherford.
The organization's unique doctrines, policies, and their lasting impact on members.
We also touch on the controversial practices of shunning, gender inequality, and their stance on blood transfusions. Whether you’re a current or former member, or simply curious about high-control groups, this episode offers valuable insights.

Resources for those escaping:
r/exjw: A reddit supportive community for former Jehovah’s Witnesses.
Learn more: https://www.jwfacts.com
Faith to Faithless: https://www.faithtofaithless.com/
